title: Unknown Place, Unknown Universe
description: Three students are trapped in the eye of a hurricane.Twenty-two years after events in Iron I: Too Bright the Sun ...Three Space Academy graduates crash-land on a desolate planet in an unknown universe after getting sucked into a worm-hole. While they struggle to escape, sinister forces gather in the constellation of Cygnus. What is the meaning of strange artifacts the castaways find? What is the implication for a tangled web of politics in our universe, assailed by sinister forces? Can anybody warn the inhabitants on a vulnerable planet of imminent invasion? What impact on philosophy will the artifacts have?This is the second book in the Iron Series.
author: Lazlo Ferran
